org.apache.openmeetings.webservice

Class JabberWebService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.openmeetings.webservice.JabberWebService

  • @Produces(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
@Path(value="/jabber")
public class JabberWebService
extends Object
    This class provides method implementations necessary for OM to Jabber integration.
    Author:
    solomax

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableRooms

        public List<RoomDTO> getAvailableRooms(String SID)
        Get List<RoomDTO> of all rooms available to the user. No admin rights are necessary for this call
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from UserService.getSession
        Returns:
        List<RoomDTO> of Rooms

      • getUserCount

        public int getUserCount(String SID,
               Long roomId)
        Returns the count of users currently in the Room with given id No admin rights are necessary for this call
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from UserService.getSession
        roomId - id of the room to get users
        Returns:
        number of users as int

      • getInvitationHash

        public String getInvitationHash(String SID,
                       String username,
                       Long room_id)
        Get invitation hash for the room with given id No admin rights are necessary for this call
        Parameters:
        SID - The SID from UserService.getSession
        username - The name of invited user, will be displayed in the rooms user list
        room_id - id of the room to get users
        Returns:
        hash to enter the room
